snippet: Sylvia Mathews Burwell, the secretary of health and human services, said that she would emphasize improving the management and operation of the site.
abstract: Health and Human Services Sec Sylvia Mathews Burwell announces in first major speech that she intends to move beyond politics of health care and work with members of both parties to improve management and operation of HealthCare.gov, website used by millions of Americans to sign up for insurance coverage.
lead_paragraph: Sylvia Mathews Burwell, the secretary of health and human services, said that she would emphasize improving the management and operation of the site.

headline.main: Health Chief Seeks to Focus on Insurance Site
headline.print_headline: Health Chief Seeks to Focus on Insurance Site

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
